root.name: Gubble 2
root.description: Gubble 2 is a family oriented, action-strategy game in the classic arcade style. Utilizing the latest 3D technology, Gubble 2 is designed by game players to be fun for people of all ages. Gubble 2 is a brand new puzzle game for the PC (Windows 95 or 98). The title character, Gubble D. Glepp, has become a wild and crazy teenager! All new tools and levels.
